text:
Clawdbot is a free tool you run on your own computer. It uses AI to do repetitive jobs automatically.

Here, it acts like a robot worker that tests a website's signup page every 5 minutes. It checks for problems like broken links, so the site doesn't lose money from errors.

5. 【完全保存版】月額0円で構築する最強の自動化要塞：Oracle Cloud × Clawdbot 実装バイブル
構築から運用まで、これ一冊で完結する決定版ガイド。

A lot of talk about Clawdbot

Seems like a cool tool. Has anyone used it?

If I could have it handle all my outreach I’d be so happy
